DOC.brief_summary: The study use randomise controlled trial design evaluate effect combine intervention Triple P-Positive Parenting Program Discussion Groups Stress Control comparison waitlist condition . The combined intervention evaluate parent Glasgow , United Kingdom , 3-8 year old child .
